rules.natural: Either the digital artist uses modeling software or the exhibition opens at the gallery.
Provided that an artist submits a digital painting, the exhibition opens at the gallery.
An artist submits a digital painting or an artist submits animated art.
If the jury selects the digital painting, then in the event that an artist submits animated art, the exhibition opens at the gallery.
Should the jury select the animated art, then if an artist submits animated art, the exhibition opens at the gallery.
The audience voting for the digital painting implies that the jury selects the digital painting.
The audience votes for the digital painting or the audience votes for the animated art.
Either the jury rejects the digital painting or, if the audience votes for the animated art, the jury selects the animated art.
An art expert critiques the digital painting or an art expert critiques the animated art.
In the case that an art expert critiques the animated art, the digital artist does not use modeling software.
The digital artist creates a virtual sculpture or the digital artist does not use modeling software.
A corporation sponsoring the exhibition entails that the corporation funds the prize money.

Either a corporation sponsors the exhibition, or a visitor interacts with an interactive installation, or if the exhibition does not open at the gallery, then a visitor does not attend the exhibition.
The media promoting the exhibition implies that if the exhibition does not open at the gallery, then a visitor does not attend the exhibition.
A TV channel features the exhibition or the media promotes the exhibition.
A streaming service hosting the exhibition necessitates that an online platform streams the exhibition.
A streaming service hosts the exhibition or a video team records the exhibition.
An activist group protesting the exhibition results in an influencer not boycotting the exhibition.
An activist group protests the exhibition or an activist group petitions the organizers.
An activist group petitioning the organizers ensures that an influencer does not boycott the exhibition.
The organizers awarding the digital painting requires that the jury selects the digital painting.
The organizers award the digital painting or the organizers award the animated art.
The organizers recognizing technical innovation implies that the jury selects the animated art.
A photographer documenting the exhibition means that if the organizers award the animated art, they recognize technical innovation.
A visitor downloading the exhibition app implies that the visitor interacts with an interactive installation.
A visitor downloads the exhibition app or a visitor views the digital gallery.
A visitor plays an art game or the exhibition opens at the gallery.
A visitor wins an art contest or a visitor does not play an art game.

rules.prover9_expression: (-(evaluates(art_critic, exhibition) -> (critiques(art_expert, digital_painting) -> rejects(jury, animated_art))) -> praises(art_critic, exhibition))
rules.natural: If it is not the case that an art critic evaluating the exhibition implies that if an art expert critiques the digital painting, the jury rejects the animated art, then an art critic praises the exhibition.
Should it be false that a video team recording the exhibition implies a visitor does not play an art game, then a video team edits the footage.
In the event that it is not true that a video team recording the exhibition leads to a visitor not playing an art game, then a video team does not edit the footage.

rules.prover9_expression: (-(attends(influencer, exhibition) | (submits(artist, animated_art) -> opens(exhibition, gallery))) -> boycotts(influencer, exhibition))
rules.natural: If it is not the case that an influencer attends the exhibition or if an artist submits animated art, the exhibition opens at the gallery, then an influencer boycotts the exhibition.

Provided that it is false that a visitor viewing the digital gallery implies that if the exhibition does not open at the gallery, then a visitor does not attend the exhibition, a visitor purchases a VR headset.
A photographer not documenting the exhibition results in the photographer publishing exhibition photos.
A photographer not documenting the exhibition leads to the photographer not publishing exhibition photos.
The exhibition not opening at the gallery implies that a visitor attends the exhibition.
